Title: LFS Record
Description:
LFS Record is a camera animation and video recording tool for Live for Speed users.
It doesn't replace programs like Fraps 100%, but in most cases you'll find LFS Record allows a lot more freedom and control.
It's developed in C# using WPF .net 4 (VS2010).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
LFS Record is a camera animation and video recording tool for Live for Speed users.
It doesn't replace programs like Fraps 100%, but in most cases you'll find LFS Record allows a lot more freedom and control.
It's developed in C# using WPF .net 4 (VS2010).

Binary download currently only available via : http://www.lfsforum.net/showthread.php?t=72001 (see bottom of the first post)

Developers downloading the source will also need to pull the InSim.Net source : http://insimdotnet.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets as this is currently part of the project file.
